text: Poor quality .used less than 1 year . Both side coating of Nelon handle already peeling off

Products arrived in poor condition which should have been a red flag given similar poor reviews. I asked politely if I could visit their warehouse to exchange and top-up with some cash, and was told the accounts have “closed” and it was too late. Well I only purchased the items a couple of weeks ago and we were still in the same month. I tried to reason with the young chap who said he was in charge but I could speak to the boss because he set the no-exchange, no-refund policy 30 years ago however boss comes in and out anytime he wants. Such arrogance. I figured the man to whom I was speaking was the boss’ son which he admitted. Such an “Ah Sia Kia” who drives a light blue BMW using his father’s cash and will probably run the business into the ground. In the future I will plan earlier and buy products from China. At the very least, I would not have to pay so much and deal with such poor attitude from an ungrateful, second-rated second generation business owner.

Low quality products.  Nelon bedroom handles came with door ordered from door shop. used for 1 month no issues but on 2nd month Latch got corroded and stucked, end up have to call locksmith to help me to escape.
The salesperson was rude and canceled my order just by sending the wrong message!!!! And no reply us any more .
